name: Andrzej Ito

With over 9 years of experience in designing and building scalable software solutions, I excel in developing training programs and applying research methodologies to enhance online, classroom, and hybrid learning experiences. My proven track record includes leading teams and mentoring junior engineers while delivering impactful projects that prioritize user experience and innovation. Currently focused on insight discovery and partnerships, I strive to enhance accessibility and technical excellence in all my initiatives.
